revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS RT-N300.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = N300 Wi-Fi Router |caption2 = |pp = http://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-N300/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = ASUS_RT-N300 |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = ASUS |model = RT-N300 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = |type = wireless router |sernum = |fcc_id = MSQ-RT1901 |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620N; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 580 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6406E; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = ESMT;M12L2561616A-6T; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$ |default_ch = |manuf = SGE |manuf_model = AP699E8N3 |manuf_rev = BT267-4 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Padavan ? |availability = only for US/CA |fccapprovdate = 08/01/2015 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "AP699E8N3.BT267-4", "REV.1.0", "ASKPCB" and "1427" (06/2014) is silkscreened on the board in the photos. {{seealso|ASUS RT-N11P|ASUS RT-N12E B1|ASUS RT-N300 B1}} * Two external 5dBi antennas for more powerful and wider coverage * 4 SSIDs help manage bandwidth allocation and access control ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-rt-n11p.shtml ''ASUS RT-N11P'' on '''iXBT'''] (RU) *[http://foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/184-asus-rt-n11p.html ''ASUS RT-N11P'' on '''FoxNetwork'''] (images PCB) ===Forum threads=== * [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:60674-4#90 ''RTN'''s post on '''iXBT'''] * [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:62022-10#303 ''Padavan'''s post on '''iXBT'''] * [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:63015:1298#1298 ''RTN'''s post on '''iXBT'''] ==Notes== 
export RT-N300_BASE := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 RALINK=y MT7628=y SSH=y 
EBTABLES=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y AUTODICT=y SHP=y RTN11PB1=y ODMPID=y 
NEW_RGDM=y RA_SKU=y REPEATER=y RA_SKU_IN_DRV=y TCODE=y MDNS=y FINDASUS=y 
BTN_WPS_RST=y DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=n WAN_AT_P4=y LANWAN_LED=y BLINK_LED=y 
SINGLE_2G=y VPNC=y YANDEXDNS=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y LAN50=y 
BTN_WPS_ALLLED=y NEWSSID_REV2=y ATCOVER=y GETREALIP=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y \
	EDCCA_NEW=y \
	TEMPROOTFS=y \
	BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=SPI \
	DRAM=32M 

export RT-N11P_B1 := $(RT-N300_BASE)
export RT-N11P_B1 += BUILD_NAME="RT-N11P_B1" 
       EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7628_BAUDRATE=57600 RT2880_DRAM_32M=y 
       UBOOT_CMDLINE=y MODEL_RTN11PB1=y SHRINK_PAGECACHE=y"

export RT-N10P_V3 := $(RT-N300_BASE)
export RT-N10P_V3 += BASE_MODEL="RT-N11P_B1" BUILD_NAME="RT-N10P_V3" 
       EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7628_BAUDRATE=57600 RT2880_DRAM_32M=y 
       UBOOT_CMDLINE=y MODEL_RTN10PV3=y SHRINK_PAGECACHE=y"
==See also== * [http://www.asus.com/event/2014/network/ASUS_AC_family_chart/solutions.html Asus Wireless AC networking solutions] * [http://www.asus.com/us/site/routers/DD-WRT/ Asus Routers with DD-WRT firmware support] * [http://event.asus.com/2013/nw/ASUSWRT/index.htm AsusWRT Support List] * [http://www.hub.ru/wiki/Devices_ASUS_WL_Routers Devices ASUS Routers] ===Wireless Router=== * [[ASUS RT-N600]] N600 (300+300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RTN600/ Product Page] * ASUS RT-N300 N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-N300/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RT-N14U]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN14U/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RT-N11P]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN11P/ Product Page] [[Category:English Documentation]]
